features.title: 3D Scooter Control
features.description: Master the art of scooter riding with intuitive 3D controls that respond to your every move.

features.title: Amazing Tricks
features.description: Perform incredible stunts and tricks as you navigate through challenging 3D environments.

features.title: Score System
features.description: Compete for high scores with our dynamic scoring system that rewards skill and precision.

features.title: Stunning 3D Graphics
features.description: Immerse yourself in a vibrant 3D world with stunning visuals and smooth animations.

features.title: Precision Controls
features.description: Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay that's perfect for players of all skill levels.

features.title: Endless Adventure
features.description: Never-ending entertainment with multiple tracks and infinite replayability.
